logger.doc:name: Logger - Start
logger.message: transactionID: #[vars.transactionId], correlationID: #[vars.correlationId] Start Update Covid Case. payload: #[payload]

logger.doc:name: Logger - Finish
logger.message: transactionID: #[vars.transactionId], correlationID: #[vars.correlationId] Finish Update Covid Case. payload: #[payload]
